name: Full Metal Spectrum
description:
FULL METAL SPECTRUM

It's year 4090. The year when great sport emerges from ruins of old world. When you must win at any price. Heavy powerful vehicles, armored with guns and boosters and drivers ready to rip and tear. 

Inspired by classic 80s micro visuals and early 90s combat racing action. So paperer yourself to relieve old school racing game experience.

-Six cars( in full version).

-Upgrades for weapons and boosts.

-Spectrum ZX visuals and sound.

-Tree characters to choose.
